primevc.gui.behaviours.drag.DragInfo

type
class
implements
primevc.core.traits.IDisposable
DragInfo contains all the information about an object that is currenly dragged.

Constructor

new(target : primevc.gui.traits.IDraggable, ?dataCursor : primevc.core.collections.IDataCursor<Dynamic>, ?dragRenderer : primevc.gui.display.ISprite, ?dragLayout : primevc.gui.layout.LayoutClient)

Instance Variables

dataCursor(default,null) : primevc.core.collections.IDataCursor<Dynamic>

Optional cursor pointer for the data

displayCursor(default,null) : primevc.gui.display.DisplayDataCursor

Information about the displayList in which the target is placed.

dragRectangle(default,null) : primevc.core.geom.IRectangle

Rectangle indicating the boundaries of the dragged object in the global coordinate-space. x-y coordinates won't update automaticly unless the ShowDragGapBehaviour is used.

dragRenderer(default,null) : primevc.gui.display.ISprite

Sprite to visualize the dragged-item during a drag operation.

dropBounds : primevc.core.geom.IRectangle

Location on which the item is dropped. Location is already converted to the coordinates of the dropTarget.

dropTarget(default,setDropTarget) : primevc.gui.traits.IDropTarget

The current dropTarget. Property will only be set if it allows the target as a IDraggable.

layout(default,null) : primevc.gui.layout.LayoutClient

Layout object of the target

target(default,null) : primevc.gui.traits.IDraggable

Instance Methods

dispose() : Void

restore() : Void
